data.title: JAX: Autograd and XLA
data.name: jax
data.description: Composable transformations of Python+NumPy programs: differentiate, vectorize, JIT to GPU/TPU, and more

evidence: "JAX is a Python library for accelerator-oriented array computation and program transformation" (library intended to be imported by other Python code, indicating a dependency artifact).
Code examples show usage via `import jax` and `import jax.numpy as jnp`, demonstrating it is imported as a library rather than run as a standalone application.

Installation instructions: "CPU | `pip install -U jax`" and PyPI badge "[![PyPI version](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/jax)](https://pypi.org/project/jax/)" indicate distribution via the PyPI package registry.
